deal.title: Up to 32%: All-day Spa Admission for One or Two at King Spa Chicago
deal.announcementTitle: King Spa Chicago: All-Day Relaxation with Authentic Korean Wellness
deal.finePrint:
Terms & Conditions

  • Valid for adult admission only.
  • Must be 8 or older. Children under 18 must be accompanied by an adult.
  • Hours and last entry: See current hours and last-entry time on King Spa’s website before visiting. Last entry is strictly enforced.
  • Admission is first-come, first-served and subject to building capacity. Weekends/holidays (approx. 11 a.m.–5 p.m.) are busiest; waits or denial of entry may occur. Tip: Arrive early or visit on weekdays to avoid lines.
  • Admission does not include massage, facial, or body scrub services; they are available for an additional fee.
  • All goods or services must be used by the same person.
  • Valid only at the Niles, IL location for King Spa Chicago.

Additional Info

  • Nudity may be required for certain amenities, which are separated by gender. Participation is optional.
  • Heat facilities may not be suitable for pregnant guests or individuals with certain medical conditions. Consult your physician if unsure.
  • Need more information? Visit the FAQs section or King Spa’s Guide for details.
deal.highlightsHtml: Step into pure relaxation at King Spa Chicago, the largest Korean-inspired spa in the U.S., rated 4.8 stars by over 50,000 guests. Open 24/7, this wellness space offers rejuvenating sauna rooms, thermal pools, and revitalizing treatments.
deal.pitchHtml:
What To Expect

  • Access to 9 sauna rooms made from crystals, salt, stone, and wood to detox and refresh!
  • Thermal pools & wet rooms to soothe muscles in healing hot & cold hydrotherapy baths.
  • Complimentary spa amenities – showers, robes, and lockers included!
  • Free WiFi & peaceful lounge areas to unwind in comfort.
  • Exclusive Access to Base Rock Room - One of only three in the world!
    Melt into Siraka mineral stones, with amethyst & coal therapy. (Don't forget to select it!)
  • Perfect for Gifting! Treat someone special to the ultimate day of relaxation!

    • When We Say Relax, We Mean It!

    Each room offers a unique experience to relax - are you ready to discover your favorite?


    Experience the rare Base Rock Room, detox in crystal-infused saunas, and indulge in authentic Korean massages, body scrubs, and facials—all while sitting amidst reviving ambiance. Stay, relax, and recharge—all in one luxurious escape.

    Read More

    King Spa & Sauna goes beyond the traditional spa experience with a full-service restaurant serving authentic Korean cuisine, a spacious movie theater for added relaxation, and dedicated sleeping areas for extended rejuvenation. The spa’s hydrotherapy pools, Himalayan salt rooms, and oxygen lounge offer further healing benefits, making it a comprehensive retreat for both body and mind. With its 24-hour access and tranquil atmosphere, King Spa & Sauna is the perfect escape from the stresses of daily life.

    Plan Your Visit

    Offer is valid ONLY at the Chicago location

    Service Hours – 9:30 AM - 11:30 PM (Last appointment at 10:30 PM for Body Scrub, Acupressure & Facial)

    Spa & Sauna Hours

    Thermal Pools & Wet Areas: Closed for cleaning 1 AM - 7 AM

    Base Rock Room & Fire Sudatorium:

    • Weekdays: 10 AM - 12 PM
    • Weekends: 10 AM - 1 AM
    Want to extend your zen?
    • Stay past 2 AM: $20 overnight stay fee
    • 24+ hours? Additional entrance fee applies
    • Extra Comfort: Another spa uniform? Just $1 per set!

    FAQs

    What’s the admission price? General admission is $60 per person—unless you score this Groupon deal! No reservations required for entry or treatments. Children under 2 aren’t allowed, and minors under 18 must have an adult of the same gender, as do guests over 75.
    Are kids allowed? Children under 8 years old are not permitted inside the facility.
    Do I need an ID to enter? Yes, everyone (except minors) needs a valid driver’s license, government-issued ID, or military ID. Expired IDs, passports, or school IDs are not accepted.
    What’s the shoe policy? King Spa is a barefoot facility—no sandals or slippers allowed. Clean socks are permitted.
    What should I wear? We provide loungewear (sizes M-3XL) for all guests. The wet spa area is nude-only, and swimsuits are not allowed.

    How It Works

    • No reservations needed – Just walk in whenever you’re ready to relax.
    • Show your Groupon voucher – it’s your ticket to tranquility.
    • That’s it! – Relax and recharge at your own pace!

legalDisclosures.line1: Promotional value expires 90 days after purchase. Amount paid never expires.
legalDisclosures.line2: Merchant is solely responsible to purchasers for the care and quality of the advertised goods and services.
